Title: Provides additional support to medically fragile children
Summary: Provides additional support to medically fragile children who rely on community-based or home health services.
LawCode: Amd §4406-i, add §§4406-j & 4406-k, Pub Health L; amd §3217-j, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to supporting medically fragile children who require community-based and home health services
